domain.resources

Class ResourcesController

  • java.lang.Object
    • domain.game.Controller
      • domain.resources.ResourcesController

  • public class ResourcesController
extends Controller
    The main controller for the domain.resources package. This will control all the other classes within the package.
    See Also:
    Life, Oxygen, Time

    • Constructor Detail

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public static void init()
        Initialize the controller. Will initialize needed classes.

      • update

        public static void update()
        Update the controller.

        As well as updating the some of the classes this will also look for changes regarding Life and Oxygen. If one of them reaches below 0, the Game will end.

      • decreaseLife

        public static void decreaseLife(int hitSmallFragments,
                                int hitMediumFragments,
                                int hitLargeFragments)
        Decrease the Life of the hull based on the amount of fragments. This calls the Life.decreaseLife(int, int, int) method.
        Parameters:
        hitSmallFragments - Amount of small fragments that hit.
        hitMediumFragments - Amount of medium fragments that hit.
        hitLargeFragments - Amount of Large fragments that hit.

      • increaseOxygen

        public static void increaseOxygen(int oxygen)
        Increase the Oxygen.oxygen from Oxygen. Uses the Oxygen.increaseOxygen(int) method.
        Parameters:
        oxygen - Amount to increase with.
